channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: For God So Loved The World
channel.desc: There are 7 testimonies to Jesus in the Gospel of John; 7 instances where Jesus claims His divinity, eg, I am the Bread of Life; I am the Light of the World. In Episode # 2, we start with John 1: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. (30 minutes).
